properties.description: please refer to the NSIP Entity Message Topic Requirements  documentation

source:
%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW nsip_relevant_reps_new 

    AS

SELECT

	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.ProjectName	AS	ProjectName
		AS	Decision
		AS	PublishStatus
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.PublishStatus	AS	ExamTimetablePublishStatus
		AS	
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.Sector	AS	Sector
		AS	
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.ProjectType	AS	ProjectType
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.Stage	AS	Stage
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.CaseReference	AS	CaseReference
	We will send Null, and this will be populated ODT	AS	Caseid
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.ProjectLocation	AS	ProjectLocation
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.ProjectEmailAddress	AS	ProjectEmailAddress
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.Region	AS	{Region}
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.Easting	AS	Easting
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.Northing	AS	Northing
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.Transboundary	AS	Transboundary
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.WelshLanguage	AS	WelshLanguage
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.MapZoomLevel	AS	MapZoomLevel
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.ProjectDescription	AS	ProjectDescription
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.SoS	AS	SecretaryOfState
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DateProjectAppearsOnWebsite	AS	DateProjectAppearsOnWebsite
		AS	
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DateOfDCOAcceptance	AS	DateOfDCOAcceptance
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.AnticipatedDateOfSubmission	AS	AnticipatedDateOfSubmission
		AS	AnticipatedSubmissionDateNonSpecific
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DateOfDCOSubmission	AS	DateOfDCOSubmission
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen	AS	DateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DateOfReleventRepresentationClose	AS	DateOfRelevantRepresentationClose
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DateRRepAppearOnWebsite	AS	DateRRepAppearOnWebsite
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.ConfirmedStartOfExamination	AS	ConfirmedStartOfExamination
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DateTimeExaminationEnds	AS	DateTimeExaminationEnds
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.Stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate	AS	Stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.Stage5ExtentionToRecommendationDeadline	AS	Stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DateOfRecommendations	AS	DateOfRecommendations
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.ConfirmedDateOfDecision	AS	ConfirmedDateOfDecision
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.Stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline	AS	Stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DateProjectWithdrawn	AS	DateProjectWithdrawn
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.Section46Notifcation	AS	Section46Notification
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DatePINSForstNotifiedOfProject	AS	DatePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.ScreeningOpinionSought	AS	ScreeningOpinionSought
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.ScreeningOpinionIssued	AS	ScreeningOpinionIssued
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.ScopingOpinionSought	AS	ScopingOpinionSought
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.ScopingOpinionIssued	AS	ScopingOpinionIssued
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DeadlineForAcceptenceDecision	AS	DeadlineForAcceptanceDecision
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DateSection58NoticeRecieved	AS	DateSection58NoticeReceived
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.PreliminaryMeetingStartDate	AS	PreliminaryMeetingStartDate
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DeadlineForCloseOfExamination	AS	DeadlineForCloseOfExamination
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DeadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation	AS	DeadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DeadlineForDecision	AS	DeadlineForDecision
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.JRPeriodEndDate	AS	JRPeriodEndDate
	casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.ExtentionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose	AS	ExtensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose
	casework_contact_information_dim.Email joins to Employee	AS	OperationsLeadID
	We will send Null, and this will be populated ODT	AS	OperationsManagerID
	casework_contact_information_dim. Email joins to Employee	AS	CaseManagerID
	casework_contact_information_dim Email joins to Employee	AS	{NSIPOfficerID}
		AS	
	casework_contact_information_dim. Email joins to Employee	AS	{NSIPAdministrationOfficerID}
		AS	
	casework_contact_information_dim.contactID	AS	LeadInspectorID
		AS	
	casework_contact_information_dim. Email joins to Employee	AS	{InspectorID}
		AS	
	casework_contact_information_dim Email joins to Employee	AS	EnvironmentalServicesOfficerID
		AS	
	We will send Null, and this will be populated ODT	AS	LegalOfficerID
		AS	
	main_sourcesystem_fact.Description	AS	sourceSystem
	We will send Null, and this will be populated ODT	AS	dateOfNonAcceptance
		AS	
	We will send Null, and this will be populated ODT	AS	rule6LetterPublishDate
		AS	
	We will send Null, and this will be populated ODT	AS	notificationDateForPMAndEventsDirectlyFollowingPM
		AS	
	We will send Null, and this will be populated ODT	AS	notificationDateForEventsDeveloper
		AS	
	NULL'	AS	rule8LetterPublishDate
